tagline: Solving the problems that growers globally are Facing and to bring expert growing techniques to everyone
desc: an established but welcoming student lead project designed to solve the problems that growers globally are facing, bringing expert and advice to everyone!

GrowersBrains is looking for collaborators looking to flex their powers either in frontend, backend or machine learning development, bringing peace and tranquillity to the world during these stressful times.
Join the team of awesome and creative individuals creating an app that will add real value to the world by empowering people to grow successful plants and crops.

tasks.title: Trello Tasks
tasks.desc: We use Trello to manage the tasks within this project. Further information on how to use Trello and claim a task can be found in the [README.md](https://trello.com/invite/b/1VgFXdo7/0135f2a7507e6062eb03f23bcf76ae3c/growers-brains) file on Github.

welcomeMsg: Please take a moment to read through the pinned messages. Here you will find important notes and how to get stated with the project!
